ui

Class UIViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ui.UIViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileOpsMessageHandler, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class UIViewController
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements FileOpsMessageHandler
    Creates a graphical user interface to control backup operations.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ashley Robertson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • handleProgress

        public void handleProgress(java.util.List<Progress> progressItems)
        Receives progress data chunks from FileOpsMessageHandler.
        Specified by:
        handleProgress in interface FileOpsMessageHandler
        Parameters:
        progressItems - One or more Progress objects containing progress updates. SwingWorker can potentially batch progress updates, hence the reason a List must be handled.
        See Also:
        FileOpsMessageHandler, FileOps.process(List)

        private java.lang.Boolean validateFileSet()

        Returns:
        true if the file set is valid or false if the file set is invalid
